path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/FiPi Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to enable/disable swap and liquify, lottery, change lottery chance/threshold, number of tokens to sell, lottery minimum speed, and _whaleSellThreshold amount.

findings.title: Liquidity receiver address can withdraw contract BNB balance
findings.description: The liquidity receiver address has the capability to withdraw the entire BNB balance of the contract.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively. These functions may abort with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
